code:
%%{FinTech_PaymentGateway}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_LedgerService] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    Cancelled --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]

    state Created {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    }

    state InProgress {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [FinTech_TransactionQueue]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> Blocked
        [FinTech_AuthVault] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {FinTech_LedgerService] --> Done
        [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        PartiallyDone --> [FinTech_AuthVault]
    }
